Package org.ggf.drmaa

Class Summary
DRMAASession This class represents a session for interaction with the DRM.
DRMAASession.Version Class used to represent the DRM version info
DRMAASessionFactory This class is used to retrieve a DRMAASession object tailored to the DRM in use.
JobInfo The class represents the status and usage information for a job.
JobTemplate This class represents a remote job and its attributes.
 

Exception Summary
AuthorizationException The specified request is not processed successfully due to authorization failure.
ConflictingAttributeValuesException The value of this attribute is conflicting with a previously set attributes.
DefaultContactStringException DRMAA could not use the default contact string to connect to DRM system.
DeniedByDRMException The DRM system rejected the job.
DRMAAException The base class for all DRMAA Exceptions.
DRMCommunicationException Could not contact DRM system for this request.
DRMSExitException DRM system disengagement failed.
DRMSInitException DRM system disengagement failed.
ExitTimeoutException We have encountered a time-out condition for DRMAASession.synchronize() or DRMAASession.wait().
InconsistentStateException The job cannot be moved to the requested state.
InternalException Unexpected or internal DRMAA error like memory allocation, system call failure, etc.
InvalidArgumentException The input value for an argument is invalid.
InvalidAttributeException The value or format of an attribute is invalid.
InvalidAttributeFormatException The format for the job attribute value is invalid.
InvalidAttributeValueException The value for the job attribute is invalid.
InvalidContactStringException Initialization failed due to invalid contact string.
InvalidJobException The job specified by the 'jobId' does not exist.
NoActiveSessionException Exit routine failed because there is no active session.
NoResourceUsageDataException This error code is returned by DRMAASession.wait() when a job has finished but no rusage and stat data could be provided.
SessionAlreadyActiveException Initialization failed due to existing DRMAA session.
SessionException A problem occured with the DRM session preventing the routine from completing.
TryLaterException Could not pass job now to DRM system.
UnsupportedAttributeException This exception is thrown when a setter or getter is called for an unsupported optional attribute.
